turns.user_message: Yes, please provide specific links or more guidance on using those sites.

user_profile.name: Mark Thompson
user_profile.description: Mark is a 50-year-old project manager with intermediate tech experience, known for his outgoing personality in professional settings. He often prefers to communicate adaptively, making him approachable despite his cautious decision-making style. With a sedentary lifestyle, he finds ordering groceries online to be a convenient way to maintain his diet; however, his impatience can make the process more challenging when faced with complex platforms.

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.timeline: Once a week, preferably on weekends
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online grocery platforms or mobile apps
additional_requirements: Option for substitution if items are out of stock
Ability to save favorite items for future orders
Clear product descriptions with nutritional information
